name: Pad Thai
description: Stir-fried rice noodles with eggs, tofu, shrimp or chicken, bean sprouts, peanuts, and a tangy sauce.

name: Tom Yum Goong
description: Spicy and sour shrimp soup flavored with lemongrass, lime leaves, chili peppers, and fish sauce.

name: Green Curry
description: A spicy curry made with green curry paste, coconut milk, meat (usually chicken or beef), eggplant.

name: Massaman Curry
description: A rich and mild curry with influences from Indian and Muslim cuisines, typically made with beef or chicken.

name: Papaya Salad
description: Shredded green papaya mixed with tomatoes, peanuts, lime juice, fish sauce, and chili peppers.

name: Fried Rice
description: Stir-fried rice with eggs, onions, garlic, and your choice of meat or vegetables.

name: Thai Spring Rolls
description: Crispy spring rolls filled with vegetables, sometimes with meat or seafood, served with sweet chili sauce.

name: Thai Basil Stir-Fry
description: A spicy stir-fry dish made with minced meat (usually chicken, pork, or beef), Thai holy basil, garlic, chili peppers, and fish sauce.

name: Red Curry
description: A flavorful curry made with red curry paste, coconut milk, meat or tofu, bamboo shoots, Thai eggplant, and kaffir lime leaves.
